products.name: Pizza Steel
products.description: Conducts heat 20x better than stone for crispier crusts and better leoparding

products.name: Digital Kitchen Scale
products.description: Essential for baker's percentages - accurate to 1g for perfect dough every time
products.imageAlt: Digital kitchen scale displaying weight in grams with a stainless steel platform

products.name: Caputo 00 Flour
products.description: The gold standard for Neapolitan - 12.5% protein, finely milled for soft, airy crust
products.imageAlt: Blue bag of Caputo Pizzeria 00 flour imported from Italy

products.name: King Arthur Bread Flour
products.description: High-protein (12.7%) flour that gives NY-style its signature chewy texture

products.name: Pizza Peel
products.description: Launch pizzas into your oven and retrieve them safely - wood or metal

products.name: Detroit-Style Pan

products.name: Instant-Read Thermometer
products.description: Check water temperature for optimal yeast activation (cold vs warm ferment)

products.name: Dough Proofing Container

products.name: Pizza Stone

products.name: Bench Scraper

products.name: Pizza Rocker Cutter
products.description: Sharp mezzaluna-style blade cuts through crust cleanly without dragging toppings

products.name: Infrared Thermometer
products.description: Know your exact oven/stone temp - critical for Neapolitan at 900°F+
products.imageAlt: Handheld infrared laser thermometer gun for measuring oven and pizza stone temperature

products.name: Cast Iron Skillet

products.name: Semolina Flour
